<Heading
  as={"h1"}

  children={"Events for given date range"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/calendar"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



- If start and end are sent, date is ignored and vice versa.
- Any date range set is converted to start on monday and end on sunday
